meanings.definition: In a manner showing or feeling intense joy or delight.
meanings.sent1: She smiled ecstatically when she saw her favorite singer perform live.
meanings.sent2: The children laughed ecstatically as they played in the park.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail ecstatically when its owner returned home.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed ecstatically under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered ecstatically as the team scored the winning goal.

meanings.definition: In a manner characterized by extreme happiness or excitement.
meanings.sent1: He ran ecstatically to tell his friends about the good news.
meanings.sent2: The fans cheered ecstatically as their team won the championship.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred ecstatically when given a new toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky ecstatically on New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent5: The children danced ecstatically at the school talent show.
